newsitem.title: INDONESIA: Elang Realty active on acquisition news.
newsitem.headline: Elang Realty active on acquisition news.

text.p: Indonesian property firm PT Elang Realty was active on reports that it would sign an agreement to acquire privately-owned retail company Gelael, brokers said.

Elang Realty -- which is to be incorporated into Bakrie Land after the unlisted Bakrie group acquired a 70 percent stake in the company in early March -- was the most active stock with about 26 million shares traded at 0815 GMT.
It was up 25 rupiah at 1,650 rupiah after touching a high of 1,675 rupiah earlier.
Brokers said active trading in Elang was linked to a report in the Media Indonesia newspaper that Bakrie Land would acquire a 60 percent stake in Gelael.
Bakrie Land officials confirmed that the signing ceremony for the acquisition was scheduled for Monday, but refused to give details.
